old:
敵スタミナゲージ の減少量が一時的に増加する
<COL ffdc78>《特殊状態》</COL>が新たに追加されました

この特殊状態が発生すると
スタミナゲージが青色に変わります

青色に変わっている間は、揺さぶりを行った時の
敵スタミナゲージの減少量が一気に跳ね上がり
敵をダウンさせるまでの時間短縮に大きく貢献します
new:
A new <COL ffdc78>"Special State"</COL> has been added that temporarily increases the decrease in the enemy's Stamina Gauge.

When this special state occurs, the Stamina Gauge will turn blue.

While it is blue, shaking will cause a significant increase in the amount of decrease in the enemy's Stamina Gauge, contributing greatly to shortening the time until the enemy is down.

new:
Also, the condition for the stamina gauge to turn blue varies for each enemy.

For example, when attacking an enraged enemy and disrupting their posture, or when winged beasts are flying in the sky. 
The conditions for the color change are diverse.

When the enemy's stamina gauge turns blue, actively cling to them and aim to shake them up.
